topic: How to deploy REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying REST APIs Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a step-by-step guide on how to create and deploy a REST API using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Deploying the API using Uvicorn or FastAPI's built-in ASGI server
caveats: Ensure your Python environment has the necessary packages installed.
Replace `Hello World` example with your own API functionality.
